title: Quick Question Regarding Blocking Someone
body:
So I had a friend who I was a little angry with (and I'm not going to explain everything) but I sent them a reply, and then proceeded to block them.
I was wondering if that _friend_ would still be able to see what I sent them just before I blocked them.
Or would they not be able to see it since when you block someone you get rid of the chat with them entirely.

replies.body:
I *just tested this* with one of my teammates and it looks like the chat history **completely disappears** after the block has gone through. This means that this person would not receive the message you sent unless they read it before you blocked them.

Let me know if you have any other questions! ^.^
